Package game.reset

Interface Resettable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ally, Astrologer, Bandit, BlackflameMonk, CastleEnemy, DireWolf, Dog, EarthEnemy, FireEnemy, FireMonk, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, GiantBat, GiantCrab, GiantCrayfish, GiantDog, GiantDragonfly, GlintstoneSorcerer, GodrickSoldier, HeavySkeletonSwordsman, Invader, LoneWolf, OceanEnemy, PileOfBones, Player, RottenStray, Rune, Samurai, SkeletalBandit, SkeletalMilitiaman, Skeleton, SkeletonMage, TrollKnight, WindEnemy, Wretch
public interface Resettable
An interface for objects that can be reset to their initial state. Created by: Adrian Kristanto

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isRemovable()
    Checks whether the object can be removed after reset.
    boolean isRemovableOnPlayerRest()  
    java.lang.String reset​(GameMap map, boolean rest)
    Resets the state of the object to its initial state.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      java.lang.String reset​(GameMap map, boolean rest)
      Resets the state of the object to its initial state.
      Parameters:
      map - the game map on which the actor is present
      Returns:
      a message describing the result of the reset process

    • isRemovable

      boolean isRemovable()
      Checks whether the object can be removed after reset.
      Returns:
      true if the object can be removed, false otherwise

    • isRemovableOnPlayerRest

      boolean isRemovableOnPlayerRest()
